Title: Authorizes Yeshivas Nachlas Sofrim to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes Yeshivas Nachlas Sofrim to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the assessor of the town of Ramapo, county of Rockland, to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Yeshivas Nachlas Sofrim
